metadata.title: CVE-2019-9942 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A sandbox information disclosure exists in Twig before 1.38.0 and 2.xbefore 2.7.0 because, under some circumstances, it is possible to call the__toString() method on an object even if not allowed by the security policyin place.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9942` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-twig - 1.23.1-1ubuntu4+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: twig package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.23.1-1ubuntu4+esm1').
